issue.title: [Website][Dev] Update merge_pr script on arrow-site repository to use new github workflow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17271](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17271). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The merge_pr script on the arrow-site repository is still using the old merge workflow. Closing PRs and not using the GITHUB_TOKEN.

We probably should update the script to use the same workflow we use on the main arrow repository.

This was raised when merging this PR <https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/pull/225>
